name: City Builder Road Simulator
description:
Grand City Construction Road Simulator

A Unique idea in the construction simulator games the special Mountain build sim 3D.
Take over the control of multiple construction vehicles and equipment.
You can enjoy realistic driving experience with real Scania tractor model on a long motorway.

Drive construction trucks, excavators, road rollers and other heavy machinery and lead the construction at slope and mountains.
Road building tasks are not easy especially in extreme conditions like mountains, hill tops and sharp turns.
Driving, Constitution, Heavy vehicle handling and off road driving adventure.
Winter is here and the snow is piling up rapidly. Do your duty: remove the snow and clear the roads!
Use roadwork vehicles like digger machine to excavate big rocks and clear roads with plow truck.
first person off road driving and heavy machinery handling are the awesome features that make off road architecture simulator an amazing 3d simulator of 2016.
Build smooth roads inside the city and over hill station paths. Driving, Parking, Excavation all available in this game.
Heavy machinery driving on off road environment is a challenge for driving & simulation lovers.
Asbulldozer crane operator, use claw machine to scoop rocks and debris off the roads.
The challenging game involves various tasks to test your driving and road constitution skills. The wait is over for you to get your hands on
something never done before!

key features:

Explore the Off Road Construction Site

Smooth Steering, Hydraulic Brakes, Lifting and Rotation Controls

Amazing Off Road Hill Climbing

Control giant road roller and bulldozer
